page.description: Resets a List row that has been edited to its original values. If the row has been marked as deleted, the row is restored to the List.

argument.name: options
argument.description: A JSON object of optional properties. Available options listed below:

property.name: prompt
property.description: true/false - If true, prompts for confirmation before resetting the row.

page.limitations: List Control with Detail View Part
